card1Text: Regular meditation improves concentration, making it easier to focus on tasks.
card2Text: Meditation helps reduce stress, creating a sense of calm and relaxation.
card3Text: Meditation promotes relaxation, leading to more restful sleep.
durationSelectError: Please select duration greater than 10 seconds.
meditationQuitMessage: Are you sure you want to quit your meditation session?
quote: “Meditation is not about stopping thoughts, but recognizing that we are more than our thoughts and our feelings.”
tagLine: Elevate Your Mind, Find Your Zen.
